issue.title: [Java] ArrowStreamWriter accumulates DictionaryBatch ArrowBlocks
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2645](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2645). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
While reading the base method ensureStarted in ArrowStreamWriter accumulates Dictionary blocks.  This is used for ArrowFileWriter but not ArrowStreamWriter.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2645?focusedCommentId=16494397) by Bryan Cutler (bryanc):*
I'll work on this and try to refactor a little to clean up

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2645?focusedCommentId=16497278) by Bryan Cutler (bryanc):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2090
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2090>
